word:
20. A Long-Standing Adventist and His Mistress 

     To One Far Gone in Disobedience. My poor, deceived, sinful brother, I will now address a few words to you for whom I have had so great a burden and interest for many years. Ira K, for years your course has been a sinful course. I have written to you but have received no response, and the reproof given has had no effect upon your course of action. . . .
